name: Blasteroids (itch) (AwesomePossum)
description:
Blasteroids is a simple arcade-style top-down shooter and the first released project from Awesome Possum Games. This Asteroids-esque game keeps track of your personal high score and has multiple ships to unlock each with their own ability, playstyle, and unlock conditions.

I don't know what else to say here since that pretty much sums it up, go ahead and play it, it's free.

(Controllers will work, but they'll need to be set up properly in the launcher, my attempts at adding them did not prove fruitful, sorry)

If you really want to spend money on it, I won't stop you, but being my first project and all, it's not really impressive or deep, but there's certainly worse things to spend your money on.  ;P

Though if you're up to donating, I'd appreciate you looking at this instead to help a friend of mine: https://www.gofundme.com/dad039s-cancer-fund

P.S. This is not related to Atari, even though it shares the name with their 1987 arcade game and third sequel of Asteroids. Don't sue me, please.
